description.value:
Choose a space within range that you can see. Each creature within a 20 foot radius sphere centered on the space you chose must make a Dexterity (Save) check. On a failed save the creature takes 8d6 points of fire damage, or half damage on a successful save.

This fire spreads around corners and ignities unattended and non-worn objects that are flammable.

Charge: This spell can be Charged to do extra damage.

  • 4 Mana: 2d6 extra fire damage
  • 8 Mana: 4d6 extra fire damage
  • 16 Mana: 6d6 extra fire damage

materials.value: A tiny cloth filled with sulfur and tar
